# vip

Variable importance plots.


## Linear model example

```{r example-lm, fig.width=8, fig.height=4, message=FALSE}
library(vip)
# install.packages("pdp")
data(boston, package = "pdp")  # load the boston housing data
boston.lm <- lm(cmedv ~ ., data = boston)
vip(boston.lm)
```
